headline: EA SPORTS and The Athletic Team up to Engage Next Generation Sports Fans
summary: REDWOOD CITY, Calif., October 07, 2025--Today, Electronic Arts Inc. (NASDAQ: EA) announced a new strategic partnership between EA SPORTS, the global leader in interactive sports entertainment, and The Athletic, the world’s leader in sports journalism, to reimagine sports content for the next generation of fans worldwide in the new EA SPORTS App. Fans can now get closer to a wide range of content – including lightning-fast stats, scores and breaking news, combined with premium editorial and video

(NASDAQ: EA) announced a new strategic partnership between EA SPORTS, the global leader in interactive sports entertainment, and The Athletic, the world’s leader in sports journalism, to reimagine sports content for the next generation of fans worldwide in the new EA SPORTS App. Fans can now get closer to a wide range of content – including lightning-fast stats, scores and breaking news, combined with premium editorial and video
